Name: INVERT
About the game: In INVERT the player will be challenged to solve several logic challenges. You must move in a limited way and make all bases turn white or all bases turn black. When jumping over a base, the same color changes and you'll use this to your advantage. Get ready for a challenging experience and challenge yourself while listening to a calm and relaxing soundtrack. Characteristics: Use the mechanic of changing the base color to make all bases the same. You have a limited amount of moves, adding a little more challenge to gameplay. 45 Stages with difficulty levels from easy to hard stages. Calm and relaxing soundtrack.
Meta Title: INVERT: Oct 16, 2021, Naoka Games and Full Overview
